ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] lute question
ygData.msgSnippet: My barbarian shaman carries a Mandolin and a Horn everywhere, both are All/All.  I used to try to convince people I really was a bard.  I did have a few people
ygData.messageBody:
My barbarian shaman carries a Mandolin and a Horn everywhere, both are
All/All. I used to try to convince people I really was a bard. I did have
a few people ask me where I got my Barbarian Illusion mask though.

Even funnier I was standing in FV the other day with my halfling druid. I
had a Mandolin out at the time to show another bard that anyone could equip
it. I then had two other people, one another bard, giving me the what for
because they thought it was really sick I was using the Halfling Skin Mask
from Nektulous Forest. Pretty funny.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Webber, Jessica [mailto:webber@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 14, 2000 9:38 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] lute question


Kitasi wrote:

> That's odd, I equip mine all the time. It does not act as a stringed
> instrument though. You can equip it with a weapon which
> really makes some
> older bards who don't know the secret jump. Nothing like
> having a 40th
> level bard begging you to tell how you managed to have an
> instrument and a
> weapon equipped at once and where you got this lute they
> never heard of.

LOL! That's cruel!

Is it equipable by other classes? If so, have a barbarian friend equip it
and convince people there's a new mask out there. ;^)

Peace
Evulia, bard of 11 missed notes, Tunare
